modName: A meticulously balanced hardcore mage experience
descriptionHtml:
Overview:
This is a mod for the hardcore purist mage.  People who like huge challenges, and want to be rewarded when they succeed.  Despite working on it for my entire skyrim playing time, I haven\'t released a single version of it because the goal is balance from start to finish.  So it takes weeks to make a full iteration.  So when I say it\'s been balanced, I mean that I played through the entire game with it twice so far to ensure it meets my own high standards for a hardcore experience.

So what exactly does it mean to be a hardcore mage experience.  Well when I think of mages in the classical sense, I think of characters who spend their lives studying the art of magic, to the exclusion of everything else, and as they reach that goal of becoming a master magician, they become gods among men.  My goal here was to recreate that.  

Fully installed without other mods interfering, this mod is hard.  It\'s built to make you fail to become a superior magician.  Even I have failed with at least two characters.  You will be tempted, and if you diverge from your path, you will find yourself weak, unsuccessful, perhaps even convinced the mod is broken.  And in a way, that means it succeeded in conquering you.  It\'s not unfair.  All the tools are there to succeed.

What this mod doesn\'t do is provide a huge number of all powerful spells.  In fact it only adds a couple new spells.  

So what can you expect:
Well, your magical skills are very weak at the beginning of the game.  Your magicka regenerates slowly.  Your spells take a while to cast.  You will be penalized for wearing armor, and robes will make it barely tolerable.  The real temptation, if you become a jack of all trades then you will be a master of none and ultimately a lousy magician.

As you progress into early mid game, assuming you maintained your focus, you\'ll suddenly find things beginning to fall into place.  You won\'t be tempted quite so much.  You\'ll struggle some against mighty enemies, but you\'ll begin to feel like a true magician.  You\'ll itch for each extra bit of power.

If you reach mid game, and your character is still viable, you\'ll be well on your path to succeed.  Spells which may have seemed impossible to use early game are within your grasp.  And then you\'ll find the truth.. the exploits are gone!  The shortcut to unlimited power is impossible to reach.  No, to continue your path to ultimate power, you must truly become the master mage.  That singular focus on magic, study and practice.


Installation:
Extract all files to your data directory.

This mod requires script dragon.

Because this mod is entirely focused on balance, and I assume you want that experience, I highly suggest you disable other mods focused on magic based gameplay changes.  

What this mod changes:
Perk trees for all 5 schools of magic.
Enchantments and how they affect your character and the enchanting perk tree
Magicka regeneration rates
Robes, when you can find them and buy them.
Spell power scaling
Spell costs, damage, and leveling factors

While not included in the mod I also highly suggest these mods and gameplay changes in order to 
maintain the balance:
Difficulty - Expert
Starting all skills at level 1
1 perk per level at least up to level 50
Elys Uncapper
Death has consequences and follower skill advancement
Key unlevelled dungeons.
author: Xanthen
